title.narrative: Multi Donor Trust Fund for the Lao Poverty Reduction Fund Support Facility

description.narrative:
The overarching development objective of the Lao Poverty Reduction Fund Support Facility will be to assist the Government of Lao PDR in rural poverty reduction through community driven development activities. The facility aims to foster the adoption of a participatory model of planning, financing and implementing local service delivery in rural parts of the country.
The objective of PRF Support Facility co-financing portion will be to improve the access to and the utilization of basic infrastructure and services for PRF II targeted poor communities in a sustainable manner through inclusive community and local development processes.
The objective of the Bank-executed activities will be to carry out high-quality analytical work in support of the operation and to provide implementation support to the Recipient on different aspects of implementation, including technical assistance for impact evaluation study, special studies, Management Information System (MIS), grievance redress systems, community facilitation, capacity-building, technical quality control, and social and environmental safeguards.

participating-org.narrative: Australia - Ministry for Foreign Affairs and Trade

job-title.narrative: Senior Social Development Specialist, Safeguard Policies
